Name: Salty Popcorn
Description: Freshly popped corn with salt sprinkled on.

Name: Caramel Popcorn
Description: Crunchy popcorn coated in sweet caramel glaze.

Name: Nachos with Cheese
Description: Crispy tortilla chips topped with warm nacho cheese sauce.

Name: Large Soda
Description: Giant serving of your favorite soft drink, perfect for quenching your thirst.

Name: Hot Dog
Description: Classic beef hot dog served in a soft bun with optional mustard and ketchup.

Name: Candy Bar
Description: Assorted chocolate bar with various flavors like caramel, peanuts, or nougat.

Name: Pretzel
Description: Freshly baked soft pretzel sprinkled with coarse salt.

Name: Ice Cream Cone
Description: Single scoop of vanilla ice cream in a crispy sugar cone.

Name: Chicken Tenders
Description: Crispy breaded chicken tenders served with your choice of dipping sauce.

Name: Fruit Cup
Description: Fresh assortment of seasonal fruits, perfect for a healthier snack option.

Name: Soft Pretzel Bites
Description: Miniature soft pretzel bites served with a side of cheese sauce.

Name: Churros
Description: Sweet fried dough dusted with cinnamon sugar.

Name: Milkshake
Description: Creamy milkshake available in flavors like chocolate, vanilla, or strawberry.

Name: Loaded Fries
Description: French fries topped with melted cheese, bacon bits, and green onions.

Name: Brownie
Description: Rich chocolate brownie, served warm and gooey.
